name: v0.19.2
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 and above

Requirements:
* Bazel 7.0.0 or later
* Bzlmod must be enabled

1. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_dotnet", version = "0.19.2")

dotnet = use_extension("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:extensions.bzl", "dotnet")
dotnet.toolchain(dotnet_version = "8.0.200")
use_repo(dotnet, "dotnet_toolchains")

register_toolchains("@dotnet_toolchains//:all")

```



## What's Changed
* CI Upgrades by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/497


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.19.1...v0.19.2

name: v0.19.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 and above

Requirements:
* Bazel 7.0.0 or later
* Bzlmod must be enabled

1. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_dotnet", version = "0.19.0")

dotnet = use_extension("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:extensions.bzl", "dotnet")
dotnet.toolchain(dotnet_version = "8.0.200")
use_repo(dotnet, "dotnet_toolchains")

register_toolchains("@dotnet_toolchains//:all")

```



## What's Changed
* include assembly version in deps.json by @mohaldu in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/487
* Mark extensions as reproducible by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/489
* Fix runtime/targeting pack conflicts when publishing self-contained by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/491
* Add Resource Assembly handling by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/492

## New Contributors
* @mohaldu made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/487

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.18.2...v0.19.0

## What's Changed

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.18.0...v0.18.1

name: v0.18.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 and above

Requirements:
* Bazel 7.0.0 or later
* Bzlmod must be enabled

1. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_dotnet", version = "0.18.0")

dotnet = use_extension("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:extensions.bzl", "dotnet")
dotnet.toolchain(dotnet_version = "8.0.200")
use_repo(dotnet, "dotnet_toolchains")

register_toolchains("@dotnet_toolchains//:all")

```

## Breaking changes
* The runfiles handling in `publish_binary` has been changed in a way that might break some users depending on how they package their binaries to move them out of Bazel. If you are using `pkg_tar` you need to make sure that you are using `include_runfiles = True`.

## What's Changed
* Targeting fixes by @sin-ack in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/470
* Map embedded resource names like MSBuild by @sin-ack in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/475
* Implement NET*_OR_GREATER preprocessor defines by @sin-ack in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/478
* Pass dependencies of analyzers as analyzer DLLs by @sin-ack in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/473
* Upgrade to Bazel 8 by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/479


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.17.5...v0.18.0

body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 and above

Requirements:
* Bazel 7.0.0 or later
* Bzlmod must be enabled

1. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark

dotnet.toolchain(dotnet_version = "8.0.200")
```




## What's Changed
* Use assembly name for DotnetAssembly{Compile,Runtime}Info by @sin-ack in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/435
* Use new host constraints in `@platforms` by @Wyverald in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/437
* Publish appsettingsjson by @mkempers in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/438
* Fix default transition reset by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/453
* Rework Analyzer/Source Generator support by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/452

## New Contributors
* @sin-ack made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/435
* @Wyverald made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/437
* @mkempers made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/pull/438

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.15.1...v0.16.0

name: v0.15.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 and above

Requirements:
* Bazel 7.0.0 or later
* Bzlmod must be enabled

1. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_dotnet", version = "0.15.0")

dotnet = use_extension("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:extensions.bzl", "dotnet")
dotnet.toolchain(dotnet_version = "8.0.200")
use_repo(dotnet, "dotnet_toolchains")

register_toolchains("@dotnet_toolchains//:all")

```



## What's Changed
* Fix 'repo_mapping_manifest' property check for compatibility by @karataliu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/412
* Fix //dotnet:defs target to allow users to create stardoc docs using it by @michaelboyd2 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/403
* Add run_analyzers option by @karataliu in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/419
* bugfix/issue-416-fsharp-debug-release-defines by @njlr in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/420
* Remove unnecessary use of ctx.resolve_tools. by @tjgq in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/425
* .Net SDK packs by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/426
* Rule API cleanup by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/427

## New Contributors
* @karataliu made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/412
* @michaelboyd2 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/403
* @njlr made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/420
* @tjgq made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/425

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.14.0...v0.15.0

name: v0.14.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 7 (We require Bazel 7 and above)

1. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_dotnet", version = "0.14.0")

dotnet = use_extension("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:extensions.bzl", "dotnet")
dotnet.toolchain(dotnet_version = "8.0.100")
use_repo(dotnet, "dotnet_toolchains")

register_toolchains("@dotnet_toolchains//:all")

```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_dotnet",
    sha256 = "d01b0f44e58224deeb8ac81afe8701385d41b16c8028709d3a4ed5b46f1c48a0",
    strip_prefix = "rules_dotnet-0.14.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/releases/download/v0.14.0/rules_dotnet-v0.14.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@rules_dotnet//dotnet:repositories.bzl",
    "dotnet_register_toolchains",
    "rules_dotnet_dependencies",
)

rules_dotnet_dependencies()

# Here you can specify the version of the .NET SDK to use.
dotnet_register_toolchains("dotnet", "8.0.100")

load("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:paket.rules_dotnet_nuget_packages.bzl", "rules_dotnet_nuget_packages")

rules_dotnet_nuget_packages()
```


## What's Changed
* net8.0 by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/398
* Add devcontainer config by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/408
* Pre BCR submit cleanup by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/409


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.13.0...v0.14.0

```starlark

http_archive(
    name = "rules_dotnet",
```

```starlark
    strip_prefix = "rules_dotnet-0.11.1",
```

## What's Changed
* Disable bzlmod in CI by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/394
* Determinism fixes by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/395


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.11.0...v0.11.1

name: v0.11.0
body:
## Breaking changes:
* Renamed `private_deps` attribute to `targeting_packs`
* Changed the input for `nuget_repo` so users will have to regenerate their dependencies

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "rules_dotnet",
    sha256 = "5667f2dffb40890951662ec515bc2d5fca73126fbb69607b2ab451a644cc986d",
    strip_prefix = "rules_dotnet-0.11.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/releases/download/v0.11.0/rules_dotnet-v0.11.0.tar.gz",
)

load(
    "@rules_dotnet//dotnet:repositories.bzl",
    "dotnet_register_toolchains",
    "rules_dotnet_dependencies",
)

rules_dotnet_dependencies()

# Here you can specify the version of the .NET SDK to use.
dotnet_register_toolchains("dotnet", "7.0.101")

load("@rules_dotnet//dotnet:rules_dotnet_nuget_packages.bzl", "rules_dotnet_nuget_packages")

rules_dotnet_nuget_packages()
```


## What's Changed
* Make Runfiles library compatible with .NET Standard 2.0 by @jimevans in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/383
* Fix overriden framework dependencies by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/386


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/compare/v0.10.8...v0.11.0

## What's Changed
* Document invariant culture and RBE by @purkhusid in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_dotnet/pull/357
